question: Which among the following sentences is true?
option1: Ammophos is an organic fertilizer while Urea is an inorganic fertilizer
option2: Ammophos is an inorganic fertilizer while Urea is an organic fertilizer
option3: Both of them are organic fertilizers
option4: Both of them are inorganic fertilizers
answer: Ammophos is an inorganic fertilizer while Urea is an organic fertilizer
